member.name: DELEGATEITEMID
member.summary: Used by delegate folders in place of a standard structure.

member.name: DELEGATEITEMID.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: DELEGATEITEMID.wOuter
member.summary: Private data owned by the delegating (outer) folder.

member.name: DELEGATEITEMID.cbInner
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the delegate's data. The first cbInner bytes of the rgb array contain this data. The remaining data in rgb belongs to the outer folder.

member.name: DELEGATEITEMID.rgb
member.summary: An array holding the inner folder's data, which is opaque to the outer folder, followed by outer folder's data.
